version_description:
Hey! :)

We fixed some minor bugs and improved overall performance.

Hey ! :)

You can now earn a LOOOOT of diamonds by sharing your profile on Snap!
Friends invitation have been replaced by diamonds.
You want more diamonds ? Then open Hoop every day ;)

Hey ! :)

We improved the decorations
You can now earn more diamonds by watching a video, getting a Snap or with daily rewards!
The user interface has been improved

Hey :)

We developed a rewards screen that shows you how to earn diamonds!
It is now easier to earn diamonds when you share your profile on Snap
The decorations screen is now available from your profile

Hey ! :)

You now have a level on your profile!
You can level up by adding new friends on Snap.
Bonus : earn diamonds every levels ;)

Hey! :)

Now, only 5 friends need to open your Hoop link on Snap to earn diamonds!

Hey ! :)

You can now earn diamonds by taking surveys! 
It is super simple and very quick.

Hey! :)

You asked for it! You can now display your age on your profile .
To do so, go to your settings, then age and enable the option.

Hey! :)

Many of you asked for it! Snap requests that you accept are not deleted anymore, they remain in your notifications.

We decreased the amount of diamands of some rewards in order to better balance the app.

Hey! :)

Hoop is now available in Spanish!
We improved overall performances.

Hey! :)
We fixed some minor bugs and improved overall performance.

Hey! :)
We fixed some minor bugs and improved overall performance.

Hey! :)

We added a new event : the Happy Sunday!
If 5 people open your Hoop link on Snap and you claim your diamonds before the end of the Happy Sunday, you earn 1000 diamonds instead of 500!

Hey! :)

We added a new event : the Happy Sunday!
If 5 people open your Hoop link on Snap and you claim your diamonds before the end of the Happy Sunday, you earn 1000 diamonds instead of 500!

Hey! :)

We fixed some minor bugs and improved overall performance.

Hey! :)

You can now enjoy offers to earn even more diamonds.
We have temporarily removed the location filter in order to improve the app's performances.

Hey!

You have been waiting for this for a while... You can now choose to see first profiles from your age group!
You will find this option in your profile's settings.

Hey! :)
We fixed some minor bugs and improved overall performance.

Hey!

It is finally here ... You can now see profiles around you!
You will find this option in your profile's settings.

Hey !

You needed this.. It is now possible to tell a user that their Snap is invalid

Hey! :)
We fixed some minor bugs and improved overall performance.

Hey ! ;)

We have fixed the looped profiles issue and improved overall performance.

You can now easily check for the #hoopapp Tik Tok video!

Hey! :)

We have improved the overall performances

Hey! :)

We have improved the safety on Hoop:
- photos now have to show a face
- when users post content for the first time, we remind them to respect our Community Guidelines

We have doubled the Daily, the Share and the Happy Sunday rewards! ;)

We have reinforced the safety on Hoop:
- users have to set their exact date of birth
- photos have to show a face
- we remind users of our Community Guidelines when they post content for the first time

Hoop is now available in the following languages:
German, Finnish, Indonesian, Italian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Swedish, Norwegian and Russian

Hey! :)
We have improved the overall performances and fixed some bugs

Hey! :)

It is now easier and faster to manage your notifications.

We have added brand new profile decorations!

We have reworked the diamonds amounts within the app to improve the reward / use balance.

Hey! :)

We have developed new features: the Super Request and the Flash Requests!
Send a Super Request to highlight your notification and increase its chances of being accepted!
Use the Flash Requests to send 100 requests at once to profiles that meet your search preferences!

Hoop includes in-app purchases. If you need more diamonds but you don't want to watch ads, you can now buy some. It is easier and faster :)
